title: Platnum’s AI plant identifier app will help you uncover your inner botanist
content:
Macworld

Although winter has settled in and the leaves have fallen from trees, spring will soon arrive. And when the snow melts and the ice finally thaws, the changing landscape will uncover various species of dormant plants.

Take the guesswork out of figuring out precisely what you’re looking at with a lifetime subscription to the Plantum – AI Plant Identifier Premium Plan (iOS) for $14.97 (reg. $59.99). This subscription plan is exclusive to devices running iOS 13 and higher.

This app serves as a portable botanist. Through the use of AI and your phone’s camera, it’s able to identify and recognize more than 15,000 species with up to 98% accuracy. Those with gardens will find immense value in this app’s ability to diagnose the conditions of ailing plants along with instructions and advice on how to care for them.

The reminder feature is a great way to stay on top of plant care. The app includes a unique light monitor that assists with locating the best location for sunlight for your plants. 

More than 20 million people have downloaded Plantum on the Apple App Store. 

“In my case, as someone interested in plant care, I find it very interesting. Application full of information and pleasant interface,” a verified 5-star reviewer writes. 

Whether you’re looking to add to your daily nature walks or want the best care for your plants at home, Plantum will help you get there. Purchase a lifetime subscription to the Plantum – AI Plant Identifier Premium Plan (iOS) for $14.97 (reg. $59.99)
